name: Gizmos_Car_Keys
title: Gizmos Car Keys
author: AoDGizmo
description: Tired of running to your car?...Run No More!...Bring your car to you! Click the car key on a car to link your keys to the car. The keys go into your hotbar or inventory, when you need your car, pick up your keys and left click the spot you want your car to appear...No more running around trying to remember where you parked it last!
